Title:
García-Sandoval R, Binder M & Hibbett DS. Molecular
phylogenetics of Gloeophyllum, Osmoporus and Griseoporia
(Gloeophyllales, Agaricomycetes) based on ribosomal RNA gene
sequences
Abstract:
Phylogenetic relationships within the Gloeophyllales are
investigated using nuclear ribosomal RNA genes. Splitting of
Gloeophyllum P. Karst. into the previously proposed genera Griseoporia
Ginns and Osmoporus Singer is supported based on analyses of internal
transcribed spacers (ITS), 5.8S, and large subunit rRNA sequences.
Morphological characters supporting delimitation of the genera of
Gloeophyllales are discussed along with molecular regions in the
alignment proposed as diagnostic characters, in the context of a
character attribute organization system analysis. The new combination
Osmoporus mexicanus comb. nov. is proposed
